snippet.title: What The Dub?! - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy on Steam: https://bit.ly/WTDSteam
Available NOW on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Steam!

What The Dub?! is a multiplayer party game where each player overdubs missing dialogue from hilariously awful B-movies, outdated PSAs, and bizarre industrial films, with their own witty (or just plain stupid) dubs!

Players watch the dubs and vote on the best one. The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins! It's just that easy! 

Over 300 so-bad-they're-good clips to dub!

You write the dub, we do the talking! Your dubs are played back via text-to-speech.

Play head to head with 3 to 12 players. 

Supports local multiplayer. Use streaming/screen sharing to connect with remote players. Enter text using your phone, tablet, or computer. 

#WhatTheDub #PartyGame #WideRightGames
